item.title: Flo's new Canon 60D
Crusing in Cuba
item.description: SENSE OF PLACE â€“ Cruising in Cuba: The National Highway in Cuba has many stretches where you will not see another car for miles. Then when you do see one, it is an old classic like this 1950s Buick, which looks at home on the open road with the Cuban landscape of fields and mountains in the distance. (James Kao/National Geographic Traveler Photo Contest)

item.title: French Beans
item.description: Our first French Beans and loads more on the way.
